medium.hint: Check the clues about inside letters.

hard.q: Two people start at the same point. One walks north, the other east. After 3 steps, they end up on the same line of x+y. If each step is the same length, who has the larger total distance from the start?
hard.a: They are at the same distance from the start; both have walked the same total distance.
hard.hint: Think about distance vs direction and step length.
